Title:
Fault-prone module detection using large-scale text
features based on spam filtering
Elements_risk_assessment:
Examine when modified regions are inserted into files. If they are inserted before
Rdate(bi), we can assume that they are bug-introducing regions.
Summary: They prepared a naive Bayes classifier and a logistic regression model as detection model
Outcome:
The results imply that large-scale text features are useful in constructing practical detection models,
    and measuring sophisticated metrics is not always necessary for detecting fault-prone modules.
